feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for carbon types by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9679

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.0...v5.10.1

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove cache warming from CreateAccount. by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9680

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.1...v5.10.2

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Make $project.name defined as empty for invoices with no project by @thirstyice in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9675
  • Adjustments for signatures by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9681
  • v5.10.3 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9697
  • Catch if referral_meta column already present in db.

New Contributors

  • @thirstyice made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9675

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.2...v5.10.3

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Trim passwords on update by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9703
  • Update BTCPay doc link by @Nisaba in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9702
  • v5.10.4 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9705

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.3...v5.10.4

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for expense reports when using tax amounts + inclusive taxes. by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9717
  • Fixes for react switching by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9720
  • Adjustments for quote partial due dates by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9731
  • Fixes for task imports by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9732
  • Fixes for exchange rate by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9735
  • v5.10.5 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9737

Security update included

Improvements to strip malicious tags prior to running snappdf.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.4...v5.10.5
